channel.title: Leadership on Ypertex Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Ypertex Blog

item.title: Improving Your Chances with Non-Negotiables
item.description: Your chances of winning any game improve drastically if you know the rules. Office work is game-like but with unclear rules. Non-Negotiables are here to help.

item.title: Underrated but Critical Start-Up Success Factors: Trust and Loyalty
item.description: How trust and loyalty within the leadership team can determine success or failure of a start-up. Based on a true story.
